title: Lynda - X-Particles for CINEMA 4D Essential Training
description:
Lynda - X-Particles for CINEMA 4D Essential Training

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been posed, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

3h 17m Appropriate for all Oct 30, 2015   | Uploaded in Jan 5, 2016 Via Webcentara

Subjects: 3D + Animation Video 
Software: CINEMA 4D X-Particles 
Author: Andy Needham 


X-Particles is an awesome addition to CINEMA 4D, allowing artists to create finely rendered fluid simulations, dynamics, and collisions quickly and easily. This course gets you started with this powerful plugin. Join Andy Needham as he walks through the Emitter interface, shows how to use modifiers to change the look and behavior of particles, create visible particles that trail and branch, make fluid and fire simulations, and render your work. He'll also provide workflow tips and a series of miniprojects that show how to create effects like pixie dust and fireworks with X-Particles.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Working with the Emitter tabs
	â€¢	Adjusting particles with modifiers
	â€¢	Creating visible particles
	â€¢	Using sprites
	â€¢	Colliding, freezing, and lighting particles
	â€¢	Caching in X-Particles
	â€¢	Applying constraints
	â€¢	Adjusting materials settings
	â€¢	Rendering
	â€¢	Sculpting particles
	â€¢	Saving and loading presets
